title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Tyler, Joey, and Julian
description:
Joey and Tyler from Paul Vanderklay's JBP Sacramento meetup talk with Julian and discuss the dynamics of the PVK community, the necessity of trust over truth for meaningful conversations, the meaning crisis, social media, and commodification of traditionally religious practices in the corporate world.

Join the ConverZation.  Talk to PVK Randos and their ilk here:
https://discord.gg/zdjzsFu

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg
